mapper.select: select from param_flowInst where product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=BIGINT} and start_flag=1 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(day,date_format(CURRENT_DATE(),'%Y-%m-%d'),end_date)>=0 order by security_type,instruction_type,market_code,invest_constitute,invest_company
SELECT id as code,flow_name as name FROM param_flowInst

select
from param_flowInst where flow_code in( select id from ( select id FROM param_flowgroup where id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} union select id from param_flowgroup where father_id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) tmp ) ORDER BY create_time desc
